name: Terrorist Shooting Combat
description:
Welcome to Terrorist Shooting Combat is first person Machine Gun Shooting Game, army force based action game with glorious journey resolve to peace. It is a military assault shooting game with a lot of missions. Loaded with missions of fps shooting game. In this first person shooting game is loaded with assault rifles, bullet force, sniper rifle, shooting guns, machine gun and rocket launcher & fps shooter to destroy enemy. A modern counter attack shooting and attacking simulation game of gang war mafie. Gun fight along AI bot as fellow soldier for counter fire to engage enemy make this a thrilling war game among free shooting terrorist shoot games.

Key Features:
• Free to play for tablet and Smartphone
• Ultra HD 3D Graphics
• Realistic sounds & Game Music
• Easy and smooth controlling tools
• Beautiful 3D snow hill environment
• Interesting and challenging missions FPS real shooting master 2018
